posts.postText:
whenever i try to play classic singleplayer or classic multi player this allways pops up

                       an error occured while loading the applet.
                     Please contact support ( i cant find the support ) to ressolve this issue
              Fatal Error occured(7):com.mojang.minecraft.MinecraftApplet



     PLZ HELP ME

Go to 

C:\Users\Your user name here!\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft

And delete everything in it, that will fix the problem.
I kind of also need help with Minecraft.... whenever I try and log in it says "Error: Failed" or something like that, but at least it gives me the option to play offline.
